@notice Sets the VRF Coordinator address
 @notice This method should only be callable by the coordinator or contract owner

devdoc.details: This interface is designed to be used in VRFConsumerBaseV2Plus.

userdoc.notice: The IVRFMigratableConsumerV2Plus interface defines themethod required to be implemented by all V2Plus consumers.
